oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Circular No. 7 from the headquarters of the Grand Army of the Republic
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Circular No. 7 from the headquarters of the Grand Army of the Republic (GAR), Toledo, Ohio. It was included in an envelope addressed James George of Fentress County, Tenn. The circular pertains to transportation rates to the 1885 National Encampment in Portland, Maine charged to GAR members by the various railroads.
